thread.title: Sterling to pay $52.5M for stake in Bloomington’s Northland Plaza
thread.title_full: Sterling to pay $52.5M for stake in Bloomington’s Northland Plaza

author: Cali Owings
title: Sterling to pay $52.5M for stake in Bloomington’s Northland Plaza
text:
Apartment Sales Tracker Home / News / Real Estate / Sterling to pay $52.5M for stake in Bloomington’s Northland Plaza A Fargo-based real estate investment trust plans to buy a share of the 298,171-square-foot Northland Plaza at 3800 American Blvd. W. in Bloomington. (File photo: Bill Klotz) Sterling to pay $52.5M for stake in Bloomington’s Northland Plaza By: Cali Owings July 14, 2015 3:25 pm 0 Sterling Real Estate Trust is under contract to purchase a 70 percent stake in the 14-story building on American Blvd. W.
